Name: Providing contracted ferry service at reduced cost to middle school students.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to providing contracted ferry service at reduced cost to middle school students

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Economic Development
This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee

Attachments.Name: Minutes of the Stated Meeting - November 21, 2024

Summary: This bill would require the inclusion of middle school students in the NYC Ferry discount fare program.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:
      
      
      Section 1. The definition of "student" in subdivision a of section 19-308 of the administrative code of the city of New York, as added by local law 47 for the year 2023, is amended to read as follows: 
      Student. The term "student" means any person who is enrolled in grade 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11 or 12, or is enrolled without an assigned grade, in a school of the city school district of the city of New York or a charter school that is located within the city of New York. 
      � 2. This local law takes effect 90 days after it becomes law.

Session 13
ARP
LS # 17877
11/14/24
